Portals.title: Portal
Portals.description: This teleports you down from this cliff area. Uncertain where exactly.

Portals.title: Entrance from Level 1
Portals.description: This is one of five locations you can spawn into when entering the area.

Stairs.title: Stairs to the Excavation Site
Stairs.description: This leads to the Excavation Site

Stairs.title: Stairs to Stonegate
Stairs.description: This leads to the middle of Stonegate

Stairs.title: Stairs to the Upper Reaches
Stairs.description: This leads to the middle of the Upper Reaches

Waystar.title: Waystar
Waystar.description: Summons a moongate to Colony for a short duration. Say 'Vas Rel Por' to use.
